document.full_text: larger financial firms should face more onerous regulatory requirements to make sure they can withstand turbulence in economy or credit markets, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke will say on thursday.
document.title: bernanke says big banks need tighter rules
lines_and_colors: larger financial firms should face more onerous regulatory requirements to make sure they can withstand turbulence in economy or credit markets, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke will say on thursday.
